data.name: VertOrientationFormat
desc: describes the vertical orientation of an object.
If VerticalOrientation == VERT_NONE, then the value "YPos" describes the distance from the top of the context. Otherwise "YPos" is ignored.

items.name: VerticalOrientation
lines: determines the vertical alignment of an object.

items.name: VerticalRelation
lines: determines the reference position of the vertical alignment.

items.name: YPos
lines: Only valid if the property VerticalOrientation contains the value VERT_NONE.
